TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit FileIOPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class FileIOPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 允許將 的安全性動作套用至使用宣告式安全性的程式碼。

span.span: Allows security actions for to be applied to code using declarative security.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檔案和目錄是使用指定的絕對路徑。Files and directories are specified using absolute paths. 當存取檔案，請建立或開啟檔案時執行安全性檢查。When accessing files, a security check is performed when the file is created or opened. 安全性檢查無法完成一次，除非檔案已關閉並重新開啟。The security check is not done again unless the file is closed and reopened. 第一次存取檔案時，檢查權限，因為開啟的檔案會發生一次，讀取和寫入可能會發生多次時，最小化安全性檢查對應用程式效能的影響。Checking permissions when the file is first accessed minimizes the impact of the security check on application performance because opening a file happens only once, while reading and writing can happen multiple times. 宣告所允許的範圍需視用。The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the that is used. 安全性屬性所宣告的安全性資訊儲存在屬性目標的中繼資料，而且由系統在執行階段存取。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全性屬性僅用於宣告式安全性。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 命令式安全性，為使用對應的權限類別。For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class. > [!CAUTION] > `Unrestricted` 授與檔案系統，包括多個可用於存取單一指定檔案的路徑名稱中的所有路徑的權限。`Unrestricted` grants permission for all paths within a file system, including multiple pathnames that can be used to access a single given file. 若要存取檔案，您必須`Deny`所有可能的檔案路徑。To access to a file, you must `Deny` all possible paths to the file. 例如，如果\\\server\share 會為對應至網路磁碟機 X，`Deny`存取\\\server\share\file，您必須`Deny` \\\server\share\file X:\file，您可以使用任何其他路徑存取檔案。For example, if \\\server\share is mapped to the network drive X, to `Deny` access to \\\server\share\file, you must `Deny` \\\server\share\file, X:\file and any other path that you can use to access the file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何要求使用類別，表示所授與給程式碼的唯一權限。The following code example demonstrates how to request by using the class, indicating the only permission that is to be granted to the code. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下列範例示範如何要求呼叫程式碼具有不受限制。The following example shows how to demand that the calling code has unrestricted . 您通常會在 managed 程式庫 (Dll)，協助防範潛在危險的程式碼中的方法或類別進行要求。You typically make demands in managed libraries (DLLs) to help protect methods or classes from potentially harmful code. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立數個執行個體類別來設定不同的檔案 I/O 的權限層級。The following code example creates several instances of the class to set varying levels of file I/O permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CPP/fileiopermissionattribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CS/fileiopermissionattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/VB/fileiopermissionattribute.vb#1)]

span.span: The parameter is not a valid .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ All { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定字串值所指定檔案或目錄的完整存取權。

span.span: Gets or sets full access for the file or directory that is specified by the string value.

value.span: 完全存取權的檔案或目錄絕對路徑。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory for full access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會設定單一檔案或目錄的存取權。This property sets access for a single file or directory. 您可以使用其他屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性，以授與指定的目錄完整存取權。The following code example sets the property to grant full access to the specified directory. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CPP/fileiopermissionattribute.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CS/fileiopermissionattribute.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/VB/fileiopermissionattribute.vb#6)]

exception.span: 此屬性不支援 get 方法。

span.span: The get method is not supported for this property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess AllFiles { System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定允許的所有檔案存取。

span.span: Gets or sets the permitted access to all files.

value.span: 值的位元組合，表示所有檔案的使用權限。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represents the permissions for all files.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會取得或設定在本機電腦與網路磁碟機上的所有檔案的允許的存取。This property gets or sets the permitted access to all files on the local computer and network drives. 個別值可藉由使用位元`AND`作業。An individual value can be determined by using a bitwise `AND` operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess AllLocalFiles { System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定允許的所有本機檔案存取。

span.span: Gets or sets the permitted access to all local files.

value.span: 值的位元組合，表示所有本機檔案的使用權限。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represents the permissions for all local files.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本機檔案是包含在本機電腦上的檔案。Local files are files contained on the local computer. 透過網路磁碟機不存取任何檔案是本機的檔案。Any files that are not accessed through a network drive are local files. 個別值可藉由使用位元`AND`作業。An individual value can be determined by using a bitwise `AND` operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Append { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定字串值所指定檔案或目錄的附加存取權。

span.span: Gets or sets append access for the file or directory that is specified by the string value.

value.span: 附加存取權的檔案或目錄絕對路徑。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory for append access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會設定單一檔案或目錄的存取權。This property sets access for a single file or directory. 您可以使用其他屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性，以授與指定目錄中檔案的存取權。The following code example sets the property to grant access to files in the specified directory. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CPP/fileiopermissionattribute.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CS/fileiopermissionattribute.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/VB/fileiopermissionattribute.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ChangeAccessControl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定可以在其中變更存取控制資訊的檔案或目錄。

span.span: Gets or sets the file or directory in which access control information can be changed.

value.span: 可以在其中變更存取控制資訊之檔案或目錄的絕對路徑。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory in which access control information can be changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會取得或設定單一檔案或目錄的存取權。This property gets or sets access for a single file or directory. 使用其他屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. > [!IMPORTANT] > 存取控制清單 (ACL) 會描述個人或群組已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案和其屬性上採取特定動作的權限。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties. 能夠變更 ACL 是重要的權限，而且應該被授與時多加注意。The ability to change an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

span.span: Creates and returns a new .
A that corresponds to this attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 永遠不會由應用程式程式碼應該只能由安全性系統，呼叫這個方法。This method should be called only by the security system, never by application code. 在編譯時期，屬性會將安全性宣告轉換成中繼資料的序列化形式。At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata. 建立中繼資料中的宣告式安全性資料，從 的權限，此方法會傳回對應至這個屬性。Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns that corresponds to this attribute.

exception.span: 存取權受到保護的檔案或目錄的路徑資訊包含無效字元或萬用字元規範。

span.span: The path information for a file or directory for which access is to be secured contains invalid characters or wildcard specifiers.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PathDiscovery { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要授與路徑探索 (Discovery) 的檔案或目錄。

span.span: Gets or sets the file or directory to which to grant path discovery.

value.span: 檔案或目錄的絕對路徑。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路徑探索控制存取本身的路徑中的資訊。Path discovery controls access to the information in the path itself. 這個值可以保護路徑中的敏感資訊，例如：使用者名稱，以及路徑中所顯示有關目錄結構的資訊。This helps protect sensitive information in the path, such as user names, as well as information about the directory structure revealed in the path. 這個值不能存取由路徑表示的檔案或資料夾。This value does not grant access to files or folders represented by the path. > [!NOTE] > 基於效能考量，只應該授與不到檔案的目錄。For performance reasons, should be granted only to directories, not to files. 例如， C:\test 等 C:\test 路徑應該授與權限\\，而非檔案，例如 C:\test\example.txt。For example, permission should be granted to paths such as C:\test and C:\test\\, not to files such as C:\test\example.txt. 這個屬性會設定單一檔案或目錄的存取權。This property sets access for a single file or directory. 您可以使用其他屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性，以授與指定目錄中檔案的存取權。The following code example sets the property to grant access to files in the specified directory. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CPP/fileiopermissionattribute.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CS/fileiopermissionattribute.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/VB/fileiopermissionattribute.vb#3)]

[!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CPP/fileiopermissionattribute.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CS/fileiopermissionattribute.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/VB/fileiopermissionattribute.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定可以在其中檢視存取控制資訊的檔案或目錄。

span.span: Gets or sets the file or directory in which access control information can be viewed.

value.span: 可以在其中檢視存取控制資訊之檔案或目錄的絕對路徑。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory in which access control information can be viewed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會取得或設定單一檔案或目錄的存取權。This property gets or sets access for a single file or directory. 使用其他屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. > [!IMPORTANT] > 存取控制清單 (ACL) 會描述個人或群組已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案和其屬性上採取特定動作的權限。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties. 能夠檢視 ACL 是重要的權限，而且應該被授與時多加注意。The ability to view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ViewAndModify { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定可以在其中檢視和修改檔案資料的檔案或目錄。

span.span: Gets or sets the file or directory in which file data can be viewed and modified.

value.span: 可以在其中檢視和修改檔案資料之檔案或目錄的絕對路徑。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory in which file data can be viewed and modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會設定， ， ，和單一檔案或目錄的屬性。This property sets the , , , and properties for a single file or directory. 使用其他屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. 對於; 僅限檔案資料的存取權限它們不包含存取控制內容和。The access rights are for file data only; they do not include the access control properties and . > [!NOTE] > `get`提供存取子是 C# 編譯器相容性。The `get` accessor is provided for C# compiler compatibility. C# 編譯器要求是讀取/寫入屬性。The C# compiler requires attribute properties to be read/write.

span.span: The accessor is called.

exception.span: 這個存取子是針對 C# 編譯器相容性而提供。

span.span: The accessor is provided only for C# compiler compatibility.
